name: yoicks
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a word traditionally shouted to encourage a group of dogs hunting a fox (= an animal of the dog family with a pointed face and ears, usually red fur, and a wide tail): Yoicks! Tally-ho! Yoicks! There he goes!
More examplesFewer examplesThere were cries of "yoicks!" and "tally-ho!"You won't find them wearing jodhpurs and shouting "yoicks!"Yoicks! yoicks! goes the huntsman. On, boys, on!
